div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 972 Develt (anc. Deultum), 27 km. S of Burgas, Bulgaria, 1951 Burial: 100-75 B.C. (T) Contents: 47+ AR. Pot hoard Lysimachus: late post. tetradr. (Byzan- tium, most of barbaric style) Disposition: Burgas 41; Sofia 6 Gerasimov, BIAB 20 (1955), p. 603
